alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 23 at 1:45AM MDT until August 23 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 101 expected. * WHERE...Ziebach County, Haakon County and Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation and the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest heat indices are expected to occur in river valleys.
info.instruction: To stay cool, go to an air-conditioned public building or stay indoors, close window shades and curtains, and use air conditioners or electric fans to cool rooms. Check on vulnerable neighbors, relatives, and friends to ensure they are safe.
